title: Arabian Nights - Quick Facts
text:
Category | Food and Beverages
Cuisines | Veg/Non-veg, Shwarma, Chinese, Pizza
Closed on | Friday
Timings | 12 AM - 10.30 PM
Room Delivery | Yes (Free)
Restricted to | None
Seating capacity | 12
Owner(s) | Firoz Ansari

title: Arabian Nights
text: The Sheesha Arabian Night , popularly known as Arabian Nights is a restaurant located just outside the Puri Gate of the campus. They mostly serve pizza and non vegetarian food and provide free home delivery. They are closed on Friday.

title: Facilities and cuisines
text: The restaurant is popular for its Shwarma, Garlic Bread, and other Chicken items.

title: Menu
text: A list of items served at Arabian Nights.
